channel.title: Apple Pay,js,javascript on Martin Costello's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Apple Pay,js,javascript on Martin Costello's Blog

item.title: Apple Pay JS
item.description:
I’ve been working on an integration of the new Apple Pay JS SDK over the last few months. If you’d like to read about it, check out my post here.

READMORE

It’s been my first time integrating an Apple API and also the first non-hobby ASP.NET Core application I’ve worked on, and has been really interesting to work with - even if at times a little frustrating!
